title: Community Engagement and IDD Peer Support
description: As an IDD community member I want to connect with IDD peers and participate in broader community life So that I experience belonging, mutual support, and valued community participation
content:
Feature: Community Engagement and IDD Peer Support
  As an IDD community member
  I want to connect with IDD peers and participate in broader community life
  So that I experience belonging, mutual support, and valued community participation

  Background:
    Given Jordan is part of the IDD community
    And Jordan deserves connection with peers who share similar experiences
    And Jordan participates in broader community as both contributor and recipient
    And the community_elohim coordinates support while making contributions visible

  Scenario: Connecting with IDD peers for mutual support
    Given Jordan wants to meet other IDD community members
    And peer connection is essential for Jordan's wellbeing
    When Jordan uses the peer connection feature
    Then the interface shows nearby IDD peers with similar interests
    And profiles use accessible format (pictures, simple descriptions)
    And Jordan can express interest in connecting
    And the community_elohim facilitates introductions with support
    And Jordan builds friendships with people who truly understand
    And Jordan experiences IDD community belonging and pride

  Scenario: Participating in IDD self-advocacy group
    Given there's a local IDD self-advocacy organization
    And Jordan wants to participate in advocacy work
    When Jordan attends a self-advocacy meeting
    Then the personal_agent provides accessible meeting information
    And the meeting uses IDD-accessible facilitation practices
    And Jordan can share experiences and voice concerns
    And Jordan's advocacy contribution is valued by peers
    And the group works on issues Jordan cares about
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for community advocacy work
    And Jordan experiences political agency and community power

  Scenario: Accessing community recreational programs inclusively
    Given the community rec center offers adaptive sports programs
    And Jordan loves playing basketball
    When Jordan joins the adaptive basketball league
    Then registration uses accessible language and processes
    And Jordan participates in the sport at their capability level
    And coaches treat Jordan as an athlete, not a charity case
    And Jordan's teammates are peers with various abilities
    And Jordan's athletic participation contributes to team success
    And Jordan experiences joy, competition, and physical activity
    And Jordan's community participation is normalized, not special

  Scenario: Contributing to community through volunteer work
    Given the local food bank needs volunteers
    And Jordan wants to help community members in need
    When Jordan volunteers at the food bank
    Then tasks are adapted to Jordan's capabilities (sorting, carrying)
    And volunteer coordinators provide clear, accessible instructions
    And Jordan's work genuinely contributes to food bank operations
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for volunteer service
    And Jordan is recognized as a valued volunteer, not as someone being helped
    And Jordan experiences being a community care provider
    And Jordan's contributions are celebrated authentically

  Scenario: Participating in IDD cultural events and celebrations
    Given the IDD community is hosting a pride celebration
    And the event celebrates IDD culture, identity, and accomplishments
    When Jordan attends the celebration
    Then the personal_agent provides event details accessibly
    And the entire event is designed for cognitive accessibility
    And Jordan sees IDD peers being celebrated for their contributions
    And Jordan participates in activities, performances, and community
    And Jordan experiences IDD pride and cultural affirmation
    And Jordan rejects ableist narratives of tragedy and burden
    And Jordan celebrates disability as difference and community strength

  Scenario: Accessing community services with dignity
    Given Jordan needs to use public transportation
    And the bus system has accessibility features
    When Jordan rides the bus to community destinations
    Then the personal_agent provides route navigation support
    And the interface shows visual bus schedules and stops
    And bus drivers treat Jordan with respect as a regular passenger
    And Jordan can travel increasingly independently with support
    And Jordan's community mobility contributes to social participation
    And Jordan experiences freedom and autonomy through accessible transit
    And Jordan's right to community access is honored

  Scenario: Teaching others in community about IDD experience
    Given a local school wants to teach students about inclusion
    And Jordan is willing to share their experience
    When Jordan participates in educational presentation
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan prepare accessible talking points
    And Jordan shares their story in their own words with support
    And students learn from Jordan directly, not just about IDD in abstract
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for educational contribution
    And Jordan's teaching shapes community understanding
    And Jordan experiences being an educator and advocate
    And the community learns to see IDD people as full humans

  Scenario: Supporting other IDD community members as peer
    Given Jordan has learned strategies for various daily challenges
    And a newer group home resident is struggling with similar issues
    When Jordan offers peer support
    Then Jordan shares what has helped them
    And the new resident benefits from Jordan's lived experience wisdom
    And Jordan's peer support is recognized as valuable care work
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for peer support contribution
    And Jordan experiences being a care provider and mentor
    And IDD peer support is recognized as essential care infrastructure

  Scenario: Participating in community decision-making processes
    Given the city is planning a new accessible park
    And community input is being gathered
    When Jordan participates in the planning process
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan access the input process
    And Jordan's preferences about park features are gathered accessibly
    And Jordan's input is valued equally with other community members
    And the community_elohim ensures Jordan's voice is heard
    And park design reflects input from diverse community members including IDD
    And Jordan experiences being an active citizen shaping community
    And Jordan's participation strengthens democratic processes

  Scenario: Building diverse friendships across community
    Given Jordan's social circle includes both IDD and non-IDD people
    And diverse friendships enrich Jordan's life
    When Jordan participates in mixed-ability social activities
    Then the personal_agent supports social coordination
    And friends engage with Jordan as a peer, not a project
    And Jordan contributes to friendships through presence, joy, and care
    And relationships are genuine and reciprocal
    And Jordan experiences belonging in diverse community
    And Jordan's social connections are honored and supported

  Scenario: Accessing community cultural opportunities
    Given the local theater offers sensory-friendly performances
    And Jordan loves musicals
    When Jordan attends a sensory-friendly show
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan select and prepare for the show
    And the theater environment is adapted for accessibility (lights, volume)
    And Jordan can enjoy cultural experience without barriers
    And Jordan's cultural participation contributes to diverse audiences
    And the theater benefits from inclusive programming
    And Jordan experiences full community cultural citizenship
    And accessibility allows Jordan's flourishing and joy

  Scenario: Responding to community emergency with supported capability
    Given there's a community crisis (natural disaster, emergency)
    And everyone is mobilizing to help
    When Jordan wants to contribute to emergency response
    Then the personal_agent helps Jordan identify safe ways to help
    And Jordan contributes at their capability (preparing supplies, making calls)
    And Jordan's crisis contribution is recognized and valued
    And the community includes Jordan in collective response
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for emergency care work
    And Jordan experiences being part of community resilience
    And Jordan's citizenship includes both receiving and providing care
